text: I always want pineapple, it’s my favorite fruit, however my body definitely disagrees. I get rashy, my tongue itches, and my throat swells a bit. Despite these signs that maybe I should not eat pineapple, I still fucking love pineapples, and if I brought some home I would eat it. I obviously should not listen to what I want and believe that my cravings know best, because they clearly don’t.
